subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The -version option enables the assertion of a version to be used within the current build sequence.

subsection.name: Default
subsection.p: If no version is specified, the default version of SNAPSHOT will be assigned.

subsection.name: Example
subsection.p: The following example demonstrates the building of a project using an explicit 2.0.1 target version using context based project selection.
